mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address ( addr_detail, addr_title, addr_name, addr_phone, addr_default,cust_seq) VALUES (#{addr_detail}, #{addr_title}, #{addr_name}, #{addr_phone}, #{addr_default}, #{cust_seq});
mapper.select: SELECT addr_seq, addr_detail, addr_title, addr_name, addr_phone, addr_default FROM address WHERE cust_seq = #{custSeq};
